meanings.sent1: Her noncommitments to the project led to delays.
meanings.sent2: The company's noncommitments to sustainability are concerning.
meanings.sent3: His noncommitments to doing the dishes always make me laugh.
meanings.sent4: The noncommitments of the wind to a specific direction created chaos.
meanings.sent5: The student's noncommitments to studying were evident in his failing grades.

meanings.definition: Refusal to make a commitment or promise.
meanings.sent1: Their noncommitments to attending the event disappointed the organizers.
meanings.sent2: She sensed his noncommitments to their relationship.
meanings.sent3: The cat's noncommitments to catching the mouse were comical.
meanings.sent4: The politician's noncommitments to specific policies raised suspicions.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's noncommitments to training resulted in poor performance.
